title: 100 PROOF: Meeting XCOPY, Marfa, Project Faith, and Why Reddit Matters
description: Kevin and Derek head to Marfa, Texas, so naturally, they discuss the Art Blocks Full Set and its implications for Collector Status. Derek talks about the process of losing faith in a project, and Kevin waxes poetic on why the Reddit NFT matters.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
itunes:summary: Kevin and Derek head to Marfa, Texas, so naturally, they discuss the Art Blocks Full Set and its implications for Collector Status. Derek talks about the process of losing faith in a project, and Kevin waxes poetic on why the Reddit NFT matters.
